alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oxford, southwestern Androscoggin and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Naples, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgton, Mechanic Falls, Naples, Gray, Hiram, Raymond, Casco, Harrison, Hebron, Denmark, Sebago, New Gloucester, Poland, Minot, Oxford, Baldwin and Otisfield. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 65 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
